languages.text: "Из этого чистейшего света явил себя мой предок". {n}Мариус делает паузу, его голос дрожит.{/n} "И он молвил: "Мое дитя! Твоя судьба — нести веру в дальние миры. Ищи благословения Вольного Торговца и отправляйся в путь". Эти слова звучали не из его уст, а словно отовсюду, и другие сильные и чистые голоса вторили ему, и... и..." {n}На мгновение кажется, что Мариус потеряет сознание, но он заканчивает почти умиротворенным тоном:{/n} "Это было чудо".

"An ancestor of mine stepped out of that most pure light." {n}Marius pauses, his voice faltering.{/n} "And he said, 'My child! Your destiny is to bring faith to distant worlds. Seek the Rogue Trader's blessing and set out on your journey.' The words didn't seem to be coming from his mouth but from every direction at once, and other strong and pure voices echoed them, and, and—" {n}For a moment Marius looks like he's about to faint, but he finishes his speech in a tone that is almost serene.{/n} "It was a miracle."
languages.original_text: "Из этого чистейшего света явил себя мой предок". {n}Мариус делает паузу, его голос дрожит.{/n} "И он молвил: "Мое дитя! Твоя судьба — нести веру в дальние миры. Ищи благословения Вольного Торговца и отправляйся в путь". Эти слова звучали не из его уст, а словно отовсюду, и другие сильные и чистые голоса вторили ему, и... и..." {n}На мгновение кажется, что Мариус потеряет сознание, но он заканчивает почти умиротворенным тоном:{/n} "Это было чудо".

Seek the Rogue Trader's blessing and set out on your journey.' The words didn't seem to be coming from his mouth but from every direction at once, and other strong and pure voices echoed them, and, and—" {n}For a moment Marius looks like he's about to faint, but he finishes his speech in a tone that is almost serene.{/n} "It was a miracle."

languages.text: « L'un de mes ancêtres est sorti de cette lumière d'une pureté incomparable, » {n}déclare-t-il d'une voix tremblante avant de marquer une courte pause.{/n} « Puis il a dit : "Mon enfant ! Ton destin est d'apporter la foi aux mondes lointains. Demande la bénédiction {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} et commence ton voyage." Ses paroles ne semblaient pas venir de sa bouche, mais de partout à la fois, et elles étaient répétées par d'autres voix fortes et pures, et ensuite, ensuite... » {n}L'espace d'un instant, Marius semble sur le point de s'évanouir, mais il termine son explication sur un ton presque serein.{/n} « C'était un miracle. »
languages.original_text: "An ancestor of mine stepped out of that most pure light." {n}Marius pauses, his voice faltering.{/n} "And he said, 'My child! Your destiny is to bring faith to distant worlds. Seek the Rogue Trader's blessing and set out on your journey.' The words didn't seem to be coming from his mouth but from every direction at once, and other strong and pure voices echoed them, and, and—" {n}For a moment Marius looks like he's about to faint, but he finishes his speech in a tone that is almost serene.{/n} "It was a miracle."

traits.locale_text: « L'un de mes ancêtres est sorti de cette lumière d'une pureté incomparable, » {n}déclare-t-il d'une voix tremblante avant de marquer une courte pause.{/n} « Puis il a dit : "Mon enfant ! Ton destin est d'apporter la foi aux mondes lointains. Demande la bénédiction {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} et commence ton voyage." Ses paroles ne semblaient pas venir de sa bouche, mais de partout à la fois, et elles étaient répétées par d'autres voix fortes et pures, et ensuite, ensuite... » {n}L'espace d'un instant, Marius semble sur le point de s'évanouir, mais il termine son explication sur un ton presque serein.{/n} « C'était un miracle. »

languages.text: «Un antepasado mío emergió de esa luz tan pura». {n}Marius hace una pausa cuando le tiembla la voz.{/n} «Y me dijo "¡Hijo mío! Tu destino es predicar la fe en mundos lejanos. Solicita la bendición {mf|de|de la} Comerciante Independiente y emprende tu propio camino". Sus palabras no parecían provenir de sus labios, sino de todas partes al mismo tiempo, y otra voz más potente y pura que la suya se hacía eco de sus palabras, y, y...». {n}Durante un instante Marius parece a punto de desmayarse, pero al final logra terminar su discurso con un tono casi sereno.{/n} «Fue un milagro».
languages.original_text: "An ancestor of mine stepped out of that most pure light." {n}Marius pauses, his voice faltering.{/n} "And he said, 'My child! Your destiny is to bring faith to distant worlds. Seek the Rogue Trader's blessing and set out on your journey.' The words didn't seem to be coming from his mouth but from every direction at once, and other strong and pure voices echoed them, and, and—" {n}For a moment Marius looks like he's about to faint, but he finishes his speech in a tone that is almost serene.{/n} "It was a miracle."

traits.locale_text: «Un antepasado mío emergió de esa luz tan pura». {n}Marius hace una pausa cuando le tiembla la voz.{/n} «Y me dijo "¡Hijo mío! Tu destino es predicar la fe en mundos lejanos. Solicita la bendición {mf|de|de la} Comerciante Independiente y emprende tu propio camino". Sus palabras no parecían provenir de sus labios, sino de todas partes al mismo tiempo, y otra voz más potente y pura que la suya se hacía eco de sus palabras, y, y...». {n}Durante un instante Marius parece a punto de desmayarse, pero al final logra terminar su discurso con un tono casi sereno.{/n} «Fue un milagro».

languages.text: “我的其中一位祖先从那最纯净的光芒中走了出来。”{n}马吕斯顿了顿，声音也变得结结巴巴。{/n}“他对我说：‘我的孩子！你的使命是把信仰传播到最遥远的世界。寻求行商浪人的祝福，开始你的旅程吧。’这句话好像不是从他嘴里说出来的，而是同时从四面八方传来，还有其他纯洁有力的声音应和着。而且，而且——”{n}有那么一会儿，马吕斯仿佛要晕过去了一样，但他以近乎平静的语气说完了话。{/n}“那是个奇迹。”
languages.original_text: "An ancestor of mine stepped out of that most pure light." {n}Marius pauses, his voice faltering.{/n} "And he said, 'My child! Your destiny is to bring faith to distant worlds. Seek the Rogue Trader's blessing and set out on your journey.' The words didn't seem to be coming from his mouth but from every direction at once, and other strong and pure voices echoed them, and, and—" {n}For a moment Marius looks like he's about to faint, but he finishes his speech in a tone that is almost serene.{/n} "It was a miracle."

traits.locale_text: “我的其中一位祖先从那最纯净的光芒中走了出来。”{n}马吕斯顿了顿，声音也变得结结巴巴。{/n}“他对我说：‘我的孩子！你的使命是把信仰传播到最遥远的世界。寻求行商浪人的祝福，开始你的旅程吧。’这句话好像不是从他嘴里说出来的，而是同时从四面八方传来，还有其他纯洁有力的声音应和着。而且，而且——”{n}有那么一会儿，马吕斯仿佛要晕过去了一样，但他以近乎平静的语气说完了话。{/n}“那是个奇迹。”

languages.text: 「私の先祖が、もっとも純粋な光から出てきました」{n} マリウスはかすれた声を止めた。{/n}「そして、彼はこう言いました。『私の子供よ！お前の運命は、遠くの世界に信念を届けることだ。自由開拓者の祝福を受け、旅立つがよい』と。彼の言葉は口から発されているのではなく、色々な方向から出ていたようでした。さらに、他の強くて純粋な声が響きました。そして、さらに…」 {n}マリウスは一瞬、気絶をしそうに見えたが、穏やかな口調で最後まで話した。{/n} 「あれは、奇跡でした」
languages.original_text: "An ancestor of mine stepped out of that most pure light." {n}Marius pauses, his voice faltering.{/n} "And he said, 'My child! Your destiny is to bring faith to distant worlds. Seek the Rogue Trader's blessing and set out on your journey.' The words didn't seem to be coming from his mouth but from every direction at once, and other strong and pure voices echoed them, and, and—" {n}For a moment Marius looks like he's about to faint, but he finishes his speech in a tone that is almost serene.{/n} "It was a miracle."

traits.locale_text: 「私の先祖が、もっとも純粋な光から出てきました」{n} マリウスはかすれた声を止めた。{/n}「そして、彼はこう言いました。『私の子供よ！お前の運命は、遠くの世界に信念を届けることだ。自由開拓者の祝福を受け、旅立つがよい』と。彼の言葉は口から発されているのではなく、色々な方向から出ていたようでした。さらに、他の強くて純粋な声が響きました。そして、さらに…」 {n}マリウスは一瞬、気絶をしそうに見えたが、穏やかな口調で最後まで話した。{/n} 「あれは、奇跡でした」

languages.text: "Einer meiner Ahnen trat aus diesem reinsten Licht." {n}Marius hält inne, seine Stimme versagt fast.{/n} "Und er sagte: 'Mein Kind! Eure Bestimmung ist es, den Glauben auf ferne Welten zu bringen. Holt den Segen {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} ein und brecht zu Eurer Reise auf.' Die Worte schienen nicht aus seinem Mund zu kommen, sondern aus allen Richtungen gleichzeitig, und andere starke und reine Stimmen haben sie wiederholt und ... und ..." {n}Einen Augenblick lang sieht Marius aus, als würde er gleich in Ohnmacht fallen, doch er beendet seine Rede in fast entrücktem Ton:{/n} "Es war ein Wunder."
languages.original_text: "An ancestor of mine stepped out of that most pure light." {n}Marius pauses, his voice faltering.{/n} "And he said, 'My child! Your destiny is to bring faith to distant worlds. Seek the Rogue Trader's blessing and set out on your journey.' The words didn't seem to be coming from his mouth but from every direction at once, and other strong and pure voices echoed them, and, and—" {n}For a moment Marius looks like he's about to faint, but he finishes his speech in a tone that is almost serene.{/n} "It was a miracle."

traits.locale_text: "Einer meiner Ahnen trat aus diesem reinsten Licht." {n}Marius hält inne, seine Stimme versagt fast.{/n} "Und er sagte: 'Mein Kind! Eure Bestimmung ist es, den Glauben auf ferne Welten zu bringen. Holt den Segen {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} ein und brecht zu Eurer Reise auf.' Die Worte schienen nicht aus seinem Mund zu kommen, sondern aus allen Richtungen gleichzeitig, und andere starke und reine Stimmen haben sie wiederholt und ... und ..."{n} Einen Augenblick lang sieht Marius aus, als würde er gleich in Ohnmacht fallen, doch er beendet seine Rede in fast entrücktem Ton:{/n} "Es war ein Wunder."

languages.text: "O ışıkların en safının içinden bir atam çıktı." {n}Marius duraksıyor ve sesi titriyor.{/n} "Ve dedi ki 'Çocuğum! Senin kaderinde ücra dünyalara inanç getirmek var. Hür Tacir'in kutsamasını iste ve yola çık.' Sözler sanki ağzından değil de her bir yönden aynı anda geliyor gibiydi ve başka güçlü ve saf sesler de onunla birlikte yankılanıyordu ve... Ve..." {n}Marius bir an bayılacak gibi görünüyor ancak konuşmasını neredeyse huzur verici bir tonda bitiriyor.{/n} "Bir mucizeydi."
languages.original_text: "An ancestor of mine stepped out of that most pure light." {n}Marius pauses, his voice faltering.{/n} "And he said, 'My child! Your destiny is to bring faith to distant worlds. Seek the Rogue Trader's blessing and set out on your journey.' The words didn't seem to be coming from his mouth but from every direction at once, and other strong and pure voices echoed them, and, and—" {n}For a moment Marius looks like he's about to faint, but he finishes his speech in a tone that is almost serene.{/n} "It was a miracle."
